title: Who is still supporting NDA
selftext:
If one has a semblence of love for this country and their own welfare, how can you still support this party?

Theye have sold the country and its people for the we a selected few. Whatever the previous governments did cannot be excused but this is our NOW

Am I missing something?
comments: Lekin ram mandir ka khyaal to modi ji rakhenge na? /s
cleaned_text: still supporting nda one semblence love country welfare still support party theye sold country people selected whatever previous governments excused missing something
